author: protolambda
content: Server experiment: discord introduced "role icons". So for every role that we had an emoji icon for already, I added the icon. Just like name colors, I hope it makes people easier to identify, and distinguish from fake accounts. If you're not happy about your team icon, want a different one, or don't have one yet, please reach out!
